pkgmetadata.longdescription: HDF is a versatile data model that can represent very complex data objects and a wide variety of metadata. It is a completely portable file format with no limit on the number or size of data objects in the collection. This Java package implements HDF4/HDF5 data objects in an object-oriented form. It provides a common Java API for accessing HDF files.
